name: AcrisPartialDeliveryCS

infos.name: Teillieferungen & Sammellieferung im Warenkorb anzeigen
infos.description:
Neu ab Plugin Version 6.x

  • Auswahl im Frontend ob eine Sammellieferung oder Teillieferungen durch den Kunden gewünscht werden (Plugin Konfiguration)
  • Teillieferungen können jetzt mit verschiedenen Optionen der Versandkosten konfiguriert werden (Teillieferungen können unterschiedliche Versandkosten haben)
  • Auswahl der Versandart im Frontend je Teillieferung durch den User (sofern mehrere möglich sind)
  • Es wird ein E-Mail Template für eine Bestellbestätigung mitgeliefert, damit das Bestellbestätigungsmail auch die Teillieferungen beim User richtig dargestellt wird.
    (dazu bitte bei den Business Event die neue E-Mail Vorlage auswählen)


Neu ab Plugin Version 10.3.x

  • TWIG-Variablen können im Text der Teillieferungsinformationen verwendet werden.


Mögliche Anwendungsmöglichkeiten -Teillieferungen im Warenkorb anzeigen aufgrund von ...

  • ... Lagerständen (sofort lieferbare Produkte und nicht lagernde Produkte)
  • ... verschiedenen Transport Dienstleistern (Paketversand vs. Spedition)
  • ...  frei wählbaren Regeln (mehrere Teillieferungen möglich)


Grundfunktionalität

Während dem Bestellprozess wird vom Plugin geprüft, welche Produkte im Warenkorb zu welcher angelegten Teillieferungsregel passen. Je nach dem werden danach einzelne Teillieferungen im Warenkorb erstellt.
Jede Teillieferung kann auch einen eigenen Info-Text enthalten.
Diese werden danach auch im Account-Bereich entsprechend ausgegeben.


Lieferungen aufteilen

In den Plugineinstellungen kann konfiguriert werden, ob beim Erstellen der Bestellung für jede Position aus technischer Sicht eigene Lieferungen erstellt werden soll.
Dies hat den Vorteil, dass Positionen einzeln storniert werden können und eigene Tracking Codes zugeordnet haben können.


Lieferstati "Im Rückstand" und "In Bearbeitung"

Das Plugin fügt die Lieferstati "Im Rückstand" und "In Bearbeitung" ein.
Zusätzlich ermöglicht es Stornierungen der Bestellungen nur für gewisse Stati durchzuführen. Eine Blacklist von Bestell- und Lieferstati wird im Plugin in der Konfiguration angegeben.


Kurzanleitung (Rule Builder Regeln und Grundkonfig wie unten beschrieben wird mit dem Plugin bereits vorkonfiguriert geliefert)

1.) Einstellungen -> System - Plugins: Installation durchführen (Grundkonfiguration ist konfiguriert und später anpassbar)

2.) Einstellungen -> Shop - Rule Builder: Mind. 2 Regeln anlegen, welche festlegen, wie die Produkte im Warenkorb aufgeteilt werden sollen.
     Beispiel: Eine Regel für Produkte mit Lagerstand "> 0" und eine 2te Regel mit Lagerstand "<= 0"

3.) Einstellungen -> Plugins -> Teillieferung -> Regeln für Teillieferung: Teillieferungsregeln anlegen


Mit diesen 3 Schritten ist die Funktion bereits im Frontend sichtbar - es werden alle Produkte mit Lagerstand in eine Teillieferung und alle Produkte ohne einem Lagerstand in eine 2te Teillieferung unterteilt.
infos.installationManual:
Die Installation des Plugins geht sehr schnell und ist unkompliziert.

  • Plugin Manager über Einstellungen > System > Plugins aufrufen
  • Das Plugin hochladen, installieren und aktivieren
infos.shortDescription: Im Bestellprozess wird geprüft, welche Produkte im Warenkorb zu welcher angelegten Teillieferungsregel passen. Je nach dem werden einzelne Teillieferungen im Warenkorb dargestellt.
infos.highlights:
Regel erstellen und damit Teillieferungen im Warenkorb anzeigen
Ideal, bei Webshops die aufgrund von Regeln unterschiedliche Lieferzeiten oder sonstige Infos anzeigen wollen
Zusätzliche Liefertati: "im Rückstand" und "in Bearbeitung"
Sammellieferung steht als Option zur Verfügung
Unterschiedliche Versandkosten je Teillieferung möglich
infos.features:
Regel basierte Teillieferungen anzeigen
Mein Konto zeigt Teillieferungen an
Neue Lieferstati ermöglichen zusätzliche Steuerungsmöglichkeiten
Sammellieferung steht als Option zur Verfügung
Unterschiedliche Versandkosten je Teillieferung möglich
Artikel in zwei Lieferungen aufteilen, wenn die hinzugefügte Menge höher ist als der verfügbare Bestand 
E-Mail Template Vorlage für Darstellung der Teillieferung steht zur Verfügung (Business Event bzw. Flow Builder muss auf das ACRIS Template umgestellt werden)

infos.name: Show partial deliveries in shopping cart and collective delivery
infos.description:
New from plug-in version 6.x

  • Selection in the frontend whether a collective delivery or partial deliveries are desired by the customer (plugin configuration)    
  • Partial deliveries can now be configured with different shipping costs options (partial deliveries can have different shipping costs)    
  • Selection of the shipping method in the frontend for each partial delivery by the user (if several are possible)   
  •  An e-mail template for an order confirmation is supplied so that the order confirmation e-mail is also correctly displayed to the user for the partial deliveries.   
    (to do this, please select the new e-mail template in the business event).

New from plug-in version 10.3.x

  • TWIG variables can be used inside the partial delivery info text.


Possible applications - Show partial deliveries in shopping cart due to ...

    ... various transport service providers (parcel delivery vs. forwarding agency)

    ...  free selectable rules (several partial deliveries possible)

    ... Stock levels (immediately available products and products not in stock)


Basic functionality

During the order process the Plugin checks which products in the shopping cart fit to which created partial delivery rule. Depending upon that individual partial deliveries are created in the shopping cart.

Each partial delivery can contain also its own info. text.
These are then also displayed in the account area.

Split deliveries

In the plugin settings it can be configured whether, when creating the order, separate deliveries should be created for each item from a technical point of view. This has the advantage that items can be cancelled individually and can have their own tracking codes assigned.

Delivery states "In backlog" and "In process

The plugin inserts the delivery states "In backlog" and "In process". Additionally it allows to cancel orders only for certain states. A blacklist of order and delivery statuses is specified in the plugin configuration.


Short instruction

1.) Settings -> System - Plugins: Perform installation (basic configuration is configured and can be adjusted later)
2.) Settings -> Shop - Rule Builder: Create at least 2 rules, which define how the products in the shopping cart should be divided.
     Example: One rule for products with stock level "> 0" and a 2nd rule with stock level "<= 0
3.) Settings -> Plugins -> Partial delivery -> Rules for partial delivery: Create partial delivery rules


With these 3 steps the function is already visible in the frontend - all products with stock level are divided into a partial delivery and all products without stock level are divided into a 2nd partial delivery.
infos.installationManual:
The installation of the plugin is very fast and uncomplicated.

  • Plugin Manager via Settings > System > Plugins

  • Upload, install and activate the plugin
infos.shortDescription: During the ordering process, the system checks which products in the shopping cart match which partial delivery rule that has been created. Depending on this, individual partial deliver
infos.highlights:
Create a rule to display partial deliveries in the shopping cart
Ideal for webshops that want to display different delivery times or other information due to rules
Additional delivery states: "in backlog" and "in process
Collective delivery is available as an option
Different shipping costs possible for each partial delivery
infos.features:
Show rule based partial deliveries
My account shows partial deliveries
New delivery statuses enable additional control options
Split item into two deliveries if the added quantity is higher than the available stock
E-mail template for displaying the partial delivery is available (Business Event or Flow Builder must be converted to the ACRIS template).

priceModels.bookingText: Show partial deliveries in shopping cart
Show partial deliveries in shopping cart

comments.text: Das Plugin erhöht durch eine transparente Ansicht der verschickten Paketanzahl die User-Experience und senkt zudem die Support-Nachfrage nach Paketen deutlich. Der Support reagiert sehr schnell und ist offen für Anpassungen. Klare Empfehlung!
comments.headline: Klasse Plugin und hervorragender Support

comments.text: Das Plugin ist genau was wir brauchen und der Support war super.
comments.headline: Exzellenter Support

comments.text: Das Plugin erfüllt alle Erwartungen und der Support reagiert engagiert auf Änderungswünsche und Rückfragen.
comments.headline: Tolles Plugin mit hervorragendem Support

comments.text: Plugin tut was es soll und Hersteller hilft sehr schnell bei Problemen. Top!
comments.headline: Tolles Plugin & super Support

changelog.text: Optimizes loading of the shipping methods.
Improves plugin compatibility.
• Improved storefront compatibility with other plugins.
Optimizes stock updater.

- The functionality when the stock level for products is released has been removed from the plugin. Please use the plugin "Release stock levels on order status "In process"" from now on.

- Improves plugin compatibility.
Improves plugin compatibility.

- Fixes possible problems in connection with PayPal.

- Adaptation of the email templates.
• Fixed wrong price rounding calculation inside storefront order history page.
Improves plugin compatibility with Shopware versions >= 6.5.0.0.
Optimizes loading of the items for the partial deliveries at the order detail page in the Administration.

- Fixes possible problems in connection with PayPal.

- Adaptation of the email templates.
• Fixed wrong price rounding calculation inside storefront order history page.
Optimizes partial delivery shipping method rules.
Optimizes rendering of the partial delivery templates.
Shows the partial delivery info text also when the setting 'show heading "Delivery 1 of 1" if there is only one delivery' is active
Adds possibility to use TWIG variables inside the partial delivery info text.
Optimizes loading of the state history entries.
Optimizes sending all products in one delivery.

•  Optimizes assigning of the shipping methods to deliveries.
  •  Optimizes sorting of the shipping methods.
Improves plugin compatibility.
Optimizes shipping methods in the cart for one delivery.

- Optimizes changing of the blocked shipping method for the partial deliveries.

- Improves plugin compatibility with the "ACRIS Shipping and payment method availability" plugin.

- Adds an option in the partial delivery configuration to split the item into two deliveries if the added quantity in the cart is higher than the item available stock.
Optimizes shipping method price calculation based on the delivery.

•  Optimizes building of the partial deliveries.
  •  Optimizes loading of the partial delivery rules.
  •  Improves delivery validation.
  •  Improves delivery shipping calculation.
  •  Improves plugin performance.
Adds an option in the partial delivery configuration to split the item into two deliveries if the added quantity in the cart is higher than the item available stock.
Improves plugin compatibility.
Optimizes partial delivery shipping method rule conditions.

•  Adds rules for the partial deliveries, if any of the assigned rules applies then the delivery will be free.
  •  Adds new "Shipping costs of all deliveries" rule condition.

•  Fixes a problem on loading of the shipping methods for partial deliveries.
  •  Fixes a problem on loading of rule price for partial deliveries.
Fixes a problem with the rules inserted by the plugin when the stock level is 0.
Fixes error on checkout finish page.
Improves plugin compatibility.
Optimizes inserting of the default rules by the plugin.
Correction of the rules inserted by the plugin in the standard.
Optimisation of plug-in compatibility with Pickware.

•  Optimizes criteria on creating an order.
  •  Adds "CheckoutOrderPlacedCriteriaEvent" event for criteria on creating an order.
Improves plugin compatibility with "ZEO BV Visible discounts" plugin.
Improves plugin compatibility with "Prems One Page Checkout" plugin.
Optimizes loading of the lineItem children at the order detail list page in the Storefront.

•  Adds plugin configuration for calculating the highest shipping costs based on assigned rules.
  •  Optimizes shipping costs calculation.
Optimizes calculating the shipping costs for deliveries with allowed shipping methods.
Optimizes calculating only the highest shipping cost.
Optimizes assigning of the allowed shipping methods for the partial deliveries.
Optimizes validating of the shipping methods for deliveries.

•  Optimizes displaying of the shipping costs in offcanvas.
  •  Optimizes loading of the shipping methods for partial deliveries.
  •  Optimizes calculating of the partial delivery shipping costs.
  •  Optimizes updating of the stocks and sales for products in partial delivery.
Optimizes displaying of the order shipping costs.
Optimizes delivery shipping costs calculation on calculating only the highest ones.
Optimizes delivery shipping costs calculation.
Optimizes shipping costs calculating for the partial deliveries.

•  Optimizes changing of the blocked shipping methods for the partial delivery.
  •  Adds plugin configuration for displaying the info message on changing the blocked method for the partial delivery.

- Optimizes loading of the shipping methods for deliveries.

- Adds validation for the blocked partial delivery shipping method.
Optimizes building of the partial deliveries.

- Optimizes using one shipping method for all deliveries on the order edit page.

- Adds plugin configurations for using one shipping method for all deliveries and for calculating of the shipping costs based on whole cart price.
Adds blocks in templates for improving the plugin compatibility.
Adds two rule conditions for checking if the shipping method apply in deliveries.
Optimizes delivery validator.
- Optimizes plugin rules.
Optimizes loading of the delivery time for the partial deliveries.
Fixes problems when shipping methods are not available for partial deliveries for Shopware >= 6.4.11.0.
Optimizes displaying of the order shipping costs.
Adds blocks in templates for improving the plugin compatibility.
Fixes problems when shipping methods are not available for partial deliveries.
Improves plugin compatibility with Shopware version >= 6.4.11.0.
Improves plugin compatibility on stock updater decoration.
Adds a new rule condition to check for the product delivery times on checkout.

• Optimizes plugin image.
  • Improves compatibility with Shopware >= 6.4.10.0.
  • Optimizes plugin color in administration.

- Fixes a problem where cancellations of orders and individual deliveries were no longer possible.

- Fixes a problem with the installation of the plugin.
Improved compatibility with Shopware >= 6.4.9.0.
Optimizes loading the partial delivery shipping method.
Adds blocks in templates for improving the plugin compatibility.
Optimizes using one shipping method for all deliveries on the order edit page.
Adds plugin configurations for using one shipping method for all deliveries and for calculating of the shipping costs based on whole cart price.
- Optimizes plugin rules.

- Fixes a problem where cancellations of orders and individual deliveries were no longer possible.

- Fixes a problem with the installation of the plugin.
Adds validation on inserting of default data.
Displays delivery column first in items grid at the order detail page in Administration.
Fixes problem with order rule ids on converting cart to the order.
Optimizes loading of the partial delivery shipping method with fixed tax.

- Adds internal id for partial delivery in Administration.

- On order confirmation the internal id is assigned to the order delivery for the API.

- Optimizes displaying of the tracking numbers for partial deliveries at Storefront.
Optimizes calculating costs for shipping methods in cart.
Optimisation of free shipping snippet.

- Optimizes displaying of the partial deliveries in account edit order page at Storefront.

- Displays free shipping message for shipping methods with cost 0.
Optimizes displaying of the shipping method tracking URL at Storefront.
Improved compatibility with Shopware >= 6.4.5.0.
Optimizes compatibility of the offcanvas template.

• Collective delivery possible and optimised (plug-in configuration)
  • Shipping method selection per partial delivery in the frontend
  • Configurable shipping costs per partial delivery
  • E-mail template for order confirmation

Adds possibility for customer to send the order in single delivery.

Adds plugin configuration for calculating one shipping cost of the multiple deliveries.
Optimize adding shipping cost promotions to the partial deliveries.
Displays delivery status of deliveries at order detail page in Administration.
Improved compatibility with Shopware 6.4.3*.
Added customer comment and tracking codes on order.
Fix a problem on loading addresses on checkout finish page.
Fix problem on loading order deliveries.
Improved compatibility with Shopware 6.4*.
Fix problem on loading order deliveries.
Display deliveries and tracking codes in administration.

• Fixes a problem when requesting the cancellation of orders
  • Fixes a problem with the display of item images in the order overview and on the order confirmation page
Solution of a possible display problem of the last order in the account overview.

• Compatibility with Shopware >= 6.3.4.0.
  • Allows to change the payment method only for certain order statuses.
  • Adds an additional validation to intercept and check unwanted status changes configured via the plugin settings.
  • Enables you to configure the stock level changes for a product during an order or status update in the plugin settings.
  • Solves a problem when changing the payment method.
Inserts the missing delivery status change from "Backordered" to "Cancellation requested".
Fixes the status selection in the plugin settings.

• Allows deliveries to be cancelled only for certain order statuses.
  • Adds the status "Cancellation requested" to the plugin settings.

• Adds the new status "Cancellation requested" and allows to use it for cancellations.
  • Allows you to individually cancel articles in the account area if this is set in the plugin configuration.
  • Fixes the shipping cost indication on the order confirmation page if the deliveries are split when ordering.
Corrects a problem where deliveries are not split if no partial delivery rule applies or exists.
Solves a problem on the order finish page

• Allows the heading "Delivery 1 of 1" not to be displayed if there is only one delivery.
  • Optimises the shipping cost display if all partial delivery rules are disabled.
• Veröffentlichung, Store Release
